name: 安德鲁·罗伯森
name_full: 安德鲁·罗伯森 Andrew Robertson
introduction: Dr Andrew Robertson is a British actor best remembered for his performances in The Cement Garden and the Gormenghast series. He also appeared as Mr. Fibuli in the 1978 Doctor Who serial The Pirate Planet. Other credits include: Adam Adamant Lives!, The Borderers, Oil Strike North, Secret Army, Blake's 7, The Onedin Line, All Creatures Great and Small, One by One, Rumpole of the Bailey, The Bill and Casualty.He is also a musician and academic, fronting UK-based band Truck, and has published work on automatic accompaniment for rock music at the conference on New Interfaces for Musical Expression.In May 2009, Robertson was awarded a research fellowship of the Royal Academy of Engineering for his work on digital music.[1] Robertson is currently a research student at Queen Mary, University of London at the Centre for Digital Music specialising in interactive real-time musical systems.[2]In January 2011 , Robertson developed software called "B-Keeper" which would allow drummers in rock bands to enhance their live performances.[3]Robertson is also a member of a band playing mainly space rock music called Higamos Hogamos which trialled the "B-Keeper" software that he developed.[4]from:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Robertson_(actor)
